org.promasi.core
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  org.promasi.core.Event

public class Event
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an event of the core. Events are thrown when a specified condition is true. The event notifies the Communicator when that condition is true. In order for the IEquation of the event to be correctly calculated the dependencies of the ISdObject must be set correctly. The class follows the javabeans specification.

Author:
eddiefullmetal

Field Detail

_name

private java.lang.String _name
The name of the event.

_equation

private IEquation _equation
The equation that the event will check. If that equation returns true(>=1 rounded by 2 digits) the event will notify the Communicator.

_context

private ISdObject _context
The ISdObject that raised the event.

_wasRaised

private boolean _wasRaised
Flag indicates if the event was raised.
